fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You collect particles of Chaos when you get visited. Once you collect 6 particles, you gain a night ability. Using it switches the roles of everyone in the game with a different, random role from the GIM thread. If the player has already completed their goal, their role will be switched but they will still win at the end of the game. Your role also gets switched. You can only use this once per game.
- Unique role.
- Roleblock immunity.
- Conversion immunity.
- Your attributes cannot be stolen or nullified.
- Bypasses all immunities.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have Chaos engulf the Town. (Switch roles once).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value: (Public to everyone): The Chaosmonger wreaks havoc among the village. Chaos has engulfed the Town!
